name: Trendy Traveler Tycoon
description:
What's up, guys?

Get your camera and passport ready for the most exciting vlogging experience ever! Start recording your journey like those internet celebrities and share your stories to your fans and common viewers alike.

Start as a budget vlogger and find your way up through exciting journeys to expand your influence. Once your influence grows greater, more money will surely flow into you, and soon you’ll become the richest and most famous internet figure ever!

Go viral and build your very own travel-loving fan community from scratch. They will always be waiting for your new videos. Keep making videos and let them know the true meaning of quality content is! Remember that greater fanbase means more money and fame for you.

Come join in and start your very own travel channel now!

Imagine your lonely phone's chiming non-stop due to the views you're receiving! Come and greet your future fans and be the richest and most famous travel vlogger ever.

P.S. Your story is so precious to us. Come share us what's going on that beautiful mind via info@alegrium.com.

***

Trendy Traveler Tycoon is packed with all the fun! See for yourself:

A TRAVEL VLOGGING SIMULATOR FOR YOU
* Tap to start new videos and lure the internet-crazed community to you. More taps, more views, more earnings for you. You got how it works.
* Own various vlogging kit. With the right tool, you'll surely make yourself go viral and dominate the internet!
* Don’t just get enough of current views. Spend your earnings to upgrade your kit. It's all for the sake of expanding your fanbase!
* Collect various outfits to freshen up your appearance and greet your viewers in different styles.

EXPAND YOUR FANBASE!
* Get more people to subscribe to your channel as you vlog more. Let them give more views to your videos, even when no tapping involved!
* Travel around the world to expand your influence further. Capture panoramas and rare moments as you move forward, and get more unique subscribers to join your fanbase community.
* Promote your channel as you wish to earn various benefits and reach more viewers.
* More viewers means more comments incoming. See how they think and react about your channel.

IT’S TIME TO BE THE RICHEST ON THE INTERNET
* Use your vlogging skill to capture as many rare moments as possible and make your videos to be the most anticipated on the internet!
* More subscribers means more money for you. Keep going to lure in more subscribers.

Your taps decide what you could do next. Tap to upgrade your equipment, tap to make more views, tap to capture rare moments, everything is just under your tap!
